S04bsu035_u:374: haneya kleśānvidhameya duḥkhān śameya rāgāṃstatha dveṣamohān // Suv_4.72 //
S04bsu035_u:375: jātismaro nitya bhaveya cāhaṃ jātiśatā jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:376: anusmareyaṃ satataṃ munīndraṃ śṛṇvīya teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hyudāram // Suv_4.73 //
S04bsu035_u:378: anena cāhaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā labheya buddhehi sadā samāgamam /
S04bsu035_u:379: vivarjayeyaṃ khalu pāpakarma careya puṇyāni śubhākarāṇi // Suv_4.74 //
S04bsu035_u:380: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca pāpāḥ praśamantu loke /
S04bsu035_u:381: ye sattvā vikalendriya aṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi kuśalendriya bhontu sāṃpratam // Suv_4.75 //
S04bsu035_u:383: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cārogyabalendriyāni // Suv_4.76 //
S04bsu035_u:385: te sarvi sattvā vyasanāgataduḥkhitā hi mucyantu te bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ // Suv_4.77 //
S04bsu035_u:386: ye pīḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu saṃsthitā hi /
S04bsu035_u:388: te sarve mucyantu ca bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyantu ca tāḍanebhyaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:389: vadhyāśca mucyantu jīvitebhyo vyasanāgatā nirbhayā bhontu sarve // Suv_4.79 //
S04bsu035_u:390: ye sattva kṣuttarṣanipīḍitāśca labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
S04bsu035_u:392: andhāśca paśyantu vicitrarūpān vadhirāśca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān // Suv_4.80 //
S04bsu035_u:393: nagnāśca vastrāṇi labhantu citrā daridrasattvāśca dhanāṃllabhantu /
S04bsu035_u:394: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnāḥ sarve ca sattvāḥ sukhino bhavantu // Suv_4.81 //
S04bsu035_u:395: mā kasyaciddhāvatu duḥkhavedanā sudarśanāḥ sattva bhavantu sarve /
S04bsu035_u:397: manaḥśāntapaurāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ vīṇā mṛdaṅgā paṭahā sughoṣā /
S04bsu035_u:398: utsāḥ sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ suvarṇapadmotpalapadminībhiḥ // Suv_4.83 //
S04bsu035_u:399: sahacittamātreṇa tu teṣa bhontu annaṃ ca pānaṃ ca tathaiva vastram /
S04bsu035_u:401: mā duḥkhaśabdāḥ kvaci loki bhontu bhā caikasattvaḥ pratikūladarśī /
S04bsu035_u:402: sarve ca te bhontu udāravarṇāḥ prabhākarā bhontu paraspareṇa // Suv_4.85 //
S04bsu035_u:403: yā kāci saṃpatti manuṣyaloke sā teṣu bhotū manasopapattiḥ /
S04bsu035_u:405: sarvābhiprāyā sahacittamātraiḥ puṇyena phalena paripūrayantu // Suv_4.86 //
S04bsu035_u:406: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ ca pūrṇam /
S04bsu035_u:407: trikāle vṛkṣehi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te sattva bhavantu tuṣṭāḥ // Suv_4.87 //
S04bsu035_u:408: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām /
S04bsu035_u:410: nīcāṃ gatiṃ sarvi vivarjayantu tarantu aṣṭāṅgikavīcivṛttāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:411: āsādayantu jinarājamūrti labhantu buddhehi sadā samāgamam // Suv_4.89 //
S04bsu035_u:412: uccaiḥ kulīnā hi bhavantu nityaṃ prabhūtadhanadhānyasamṛddhakośāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:413: rūpeṇa śauryeṇa yaśena kīrtyā samalaṅkṛtā bhontu anekakalpān // Suv_4.90 //
S04bsu035_u:414: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāśca vīrāśca vijñapaṇḍitāśca /
S04bsu035_u:415: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu // Suv_4.91 //
S04bsu035_u:418: vaiḍūryasiṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇān śṛṇvantu dharmāṃśca prakāśyamānān // Suv_4.92 //
S04bsu035_u:419: pāpāni karmāṇi mayā jitāni pūrvārjitā yadbhavasaṃkaṭeṣu /
S04bsu035_u:420: ye pāpakarmābhiratā vahante te sarvi kṣīyantu ca nirviśeṣāḥ // Suv_4.93 //
S04bsu035_u:422: prajñākarairbhāsita bhontu bandhanānmucyantu duḥkhairupajā bhavantu // Suv_4.94 //
S04bsu035_u:423: ye cāpi sattvā iha jāmbudvīpe ye cāpi anyaṣu ca lokadhātuṣu /
S04bsu035_u:426: praṇidhānasiddhiḥ saphalā mayāstu spṛśeya bodhiṃ virajāmanuttarām // Suv_4.96 //
S04bsu035_u:427: yo vandate toṣyati daśabalān sadā ca prasannaśuddhāmalamānasena /
S04bsu035_u:428: imāya pariṇāmanadeśanāya ṣaṣṭiṃ ca kalpān jahate apāyān // Suv_4.97 //
S04bsu035_u:429: etebhi ślokebhi ca varṇitebhiḥ puruṣāḥ striyo brahmaṇakṣatriyā ca /
S04bsu035_u:431: yastoṣyate muniṃ sa kṛtāñjalibhiḥ sthihitva sarvatra jātismaru śatajātiṣu // Suv_4.98 //
S04bsu035_u:433: narendrarājaiśca supūjitaḥ sadā etādṛśo bheṣyati tatra tatra // Suv_4.99 //
S04bsu035_u:434: na tairekasya buddhasya cāntike kuśalaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu035_u:435: na dvayorapi trayeṣu na pañcasu na daśasu // Suv_4.100 //
S04bsu035_u:443: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena rājā suvarṇabhujendro nāmāsīt /
S04bsu035_u:445: ye jina pūrvaka ye ca bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśodiśi loke /
S04bsu035_u:446: teṣa jināna karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ praśayiṣye // Suv_5.1 //
S04bsu035_u:463: teṣu ca sarvasukhārpitasattvaṃ sarvapraśānta apāyagatīṣu // Suv_5.9 //
S04bsu035_u:472: te 'pi ca niṣṭhita sarvamabhūṣi buddhaprabhāsavirocanatāyai // Suv_5.13 //
S04bsu035_u:478: sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye ca sthihanti // Suv_5.16 //
S04bsu035_u:479: teṣa jināna karomi praṇāmaṃ kāyatu vācamanena prasannaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:481: jihvaśatairapi buddhaguṇāni kalpasahasraśate na hi vaktum /
S04bsu035_u:483: ye guṇasādhunivṛtti jinānāṃ sā ca varāgravicitra anekaiḥ // Suv_5.18 //
S04bsu035_u:484: ekajinasya guṇā na hi śakyā jihvaśatairapi bhāṣitu kaścit /
S04bsu035_u:485: kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistara vaktum // Suv_5.19 //
S04bsu035_u:487: keśagrahaṇena tu śakya pramātuṃ naiva ca ekaguṇā sugatānām // Suv_5.20 //
S04bsu035_u:488: varṇita saṃstuta me jinasarvaṃ kāyatu vāca prasannamanena /
S04bsu035_u:489: yanmama sañcitapuṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam // Suv_5.21 //
S04bsu035_u:490: evaṃ stavitva narapati buddhaṃ evaṃ karoti nṛpaḥ praṇidhānam /
S04bsu035_u:491: yatra ca kutraci mahya bhaveta jāti anāgatakalpamanantā // Suv_5.22 //
S04bsu035_u:492: īdṛśi bheri mi paśyami svapne īdṛśa deśana tatra śṛṇomi /
S04bsu035_u:493: īdṛśa jīnastutikamalākara jātiṣu tatra labhe smaraṇatvam // Suv_5.23 //
S04bsu035_u:494: buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyā ye 'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu035_u:496: amu śruṇeya ca svapnagato 'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato 'pi // Suv_5.24 //
S04bsu035_u:497: duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhi pi pāramitābhiḥ /
S04bsu035_u:498: bodhimanuttara paśca labheyaṃ kṣetra bhaveta mamā asamarthyam // Suv_5.25 //
S04bsu035_u:500: saṃmukha paśyami śākyamunīndraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ hyahu tatra labheyam // Suv_5.26 //
S04bsu035_u:501: ye ima dāraka dvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāsvaraḥ /
S04bsu035_u:502: te ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttara vyākaraṇaṃ ca // Suv_5.27 //
S04bsu035_u:503: ye 'pi ca sattva arakṣa atrāṇā śaraṇavihīna viyāsagatāśca /
S04bsu035_u:504: teṣu bhaveya anāgata sarva trāṇaparāyaṇaśaraṇebhiśca // Suv_5.28 //
S04bsu035_u:506: kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattaka pūrvakakoṭigatāśca // Suv_5.29 //
S04bsu035_u:509: karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vicchidyatu mahyam // Suv_5.30 //
S04bsu035_u:510: puṇyasamudra prapūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam /
S04bsu035_u:513: puṇyaprabhāsa bhaviṣyati mahyaṃ bodhiprabhāsa viśodhyatu mahyam // Suv_5.32 //
S04bsu035_u:514: kāyaprabhāsa bhaviṣyati mahyaṃ puṇyaprabhāsa virocanatā ca /
S04bsu035_u:515: sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyaṃ pūṇyabalena samanvita nityam // Suv_5.33 //
S04bsu035_u:524: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata //
S04bsu035_u:526: tasmādime sūtravarottame vaḥ saṃkṣepato deśita śūnyadharmāḥ // Suv_6.1 //
S04bsu035_u:527: sattvo 'lpabuddhiravijānamāno na śakya jñātuṃ khalu sarvadharmā /
S04bsu035_u:528: paśyeha sūtrendravarottamena saṃkṣepato deśita śūnyadharmāḥ // Suv_6.2 //
S04bsu035_u:530: prakāśitaṃ sūtravarendrametaṃ yathābhijānanti hi sarvasattvāḥ // Suv_6.3 //
S04bsu035_u:531: ayaṃ ca kāyo yatha śūnyagrāmaḥ ṣaḍgrāma coropama indriyāṇi /
S04bsu035_u:532: tānyekagrāme nivasanti sarve na te vijānanti paraspareṇa // Suv_6.4 //
S04bsu035_u:534: ghrāṇendriyaṃ gandhavicitrahāri jihvandriyaṃ nitya raseṣu dhāvati // Suv_6.5 //
S04bsu035_u:537: ṣaḍindriyāṇīti paraspareṇa svakaṃ svakaṃ viṣayamabhidhāvati // Suv_6.6 //
S04bsu035_u:538: cittaṃ hi māyopama cañcalaṃ ca ṣaḍindriyaṃ viṣayavicāraṇaṃ ca /
S04bsu035_u:539: yathā naro dhāvati śūnyagrāme saṃgrāma caurebhi samāśritaśca // Suv_6.7 //
S04bsu035_u:540: cittaṃ yathā ṣaḍviṣayāśritaṃ ca prajānate indriya gocaraṃ ca /
S04bsu035_u:541: rūpaṃ ca śabdaṃ ca tathaiva gandhaṃ rasaṃ ca sparśa tatha dharmagocaram // Suv_6.8 //
S04bsu035_u:542: cittaṃ ca sarvatra ṣaḍindriyeṣu śakuniriva cañcalaṃ indriyasaṃpraviṣṭam /
S04bsu035_u:543: yatra yatrendriyasaṃśritaṃ ca na cendriyaṃ kurvatu jānamātmakam // Suv_6.9 //
S04bsu035_u:544: kāyaśca niśceṣṭa nirvyāpāraṃ ca asārakaḥ pratyayasaṃbhavaśca /
S04bsu035_u:548: paraspareṇaiva sadā viruddhā yathaiva āśīviṣa ekaveśmani // Suv_6.11 //
S04bsu035_u:549: dhātūragāste ca caturvidhāni dve ūrdhvagāmī dvaya heṣṭagāmī /
S04bsu035_u:550: dvayādvayaṃ diśi vidiśāsu sarvaṃ naśyanti tā dhātubhujaṅgamāni // Suv_6.12 //
S04bsu035_u:551: kṣityuragaśca saliloragaśca imau ca heṣṭā kṣayatāṃ vrajete /
S04bsu035_u:552: tejoragaścānilamārutoraga imau hi dve ūrdhvagatau nabho 'nte // Suv_6.13 //
S04bsu035_u:553: cittaṃ ca vijñānamadhyasthitaṃ ca gatvā yathā pūrvakṛtena karmāṇā /
S04bsu035_u:554: deve manuṣyaeṣu ca triṣvapāyā yathākṛtaṃ pūrvabhave pravarttyā // Suv_6.14 //
S04bsu035_u:556: nirābhirāmaḥ kṛmikṣudrapūrṇaḥ kṣiptaḥ śmaśāne yatha kāṣṭhabhūtaḥ // Suv_6.15 //
S04bsu035_u:557: paśyāhi tvaṃ devata ebhi evaṃ katyatra sattvastatha pudgalo vā /
S04bsu035_u:559: śūnyā hi ete khalu sarvadharmā avidyataḥ pratyayasaṃbhavāśca // Suv_6.16 //
S04bsu035_u:561: tasmācca bhūtā hi asaṃbhavāśca avidyamānā na kadāci vidyate // Suv_6.17 //
S04bsu035_u:563: tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā saṃskāravijñāna sanāmarūpam // Suv_6.18 //
S04bsu035_u:564: ṣaḍāyatanasparśa tathaiva vedanā tṛṣṇā upādāna tathā bhavaśca /
S04bsu035_u:565: jātijarāmaraṇaśoka upadravāṇāṃ duḥkhāni saṃskāra acintiyāni // Suv_6.19 //
S04bsu035_u:566: saṃsāracakre ca yathā sthitāni abhūta saṃbhūta asaṃbhavāśca /
S04bsu035_u:567: ayoniśaścittavicāraṇaṃ tathā dṛṣṭīgataṃ chetsyatha ātmanaiva // Suv_6.20 //
S04bsu035_u:568: jñānāsinā chindatha kleśajālaṃ skandhālayaṃ paśyatha śūnyabhūtam /
S04bsu035_u:569: sparśetha taṃ bodhiguṇaṃ hyudāraṃ vivarta ca me amṛtapurasya dvāram // Suv_6.21 //
S04bsu035_u:570: saṃdarśi taṃ amṛtapurasya bhājanaṃ pravekṣya taṃ amṛtapurālayaṃ śubham /
S04bsu035_u:572: tarpiṣya ha amṛtatarasena ātmanāṃ parāhatā me varadharmabherīḥ // Suv_6.22 //
S04bsu035_u:573: āpūrito me varadharmaśaṅkhaḥ prajvālitā me varadharma ulkā /
S04bsu035_u:574: suvarṣitaṃ me varadharmavarṣaṃ parājitā me parakleśaśatravaḥ // Suv_6.23 //
S04bsu035_u:575: ucchrepitaṃ me varadharmadhvajaṃ pratāritā me bhavasattvasamudrāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:576: pidhitāni me 'pāyapathāni trīṇi kleśāgnidāhaṃ śamayitva prāṇinām // Suv_6.24 //
S04bsu035_u:577: yasmāddhi pūrvamahamanekakalpān acintiyā pūjitva nāyakā hi /
S04bsu035_u:578: caritva bodhāya dṛḍhavratena saddharmakāyaṃ pariveṣamāṇaḥ // Suv_6.25 //
S04bsu035_u:579: hastau ca pādau ca parityajitvā dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ maṇimuktabhūṣaṇam /
S04bsu035_u:582: sarvaṃ ca cūrṇayitvā tat kuryāt sūkṣmarajopamam // Suv_6.27 //
S04bsu035_u:586: sarvasattvā aneke hi jñānavata tathaiva ca /
S04bsu035_u:587: sarvaṃ gaṇayituṃ śakyaṃ na tu jñātaṃ jinasya ca // Suv_6.29 //
S04bsu035_u:589: anekakalpakoṭīṣu na śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ kvacit // Suv_6.30 //
S04bsu035_u:594_0: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo virūḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo
S04bsu035_u:594_1: mahārāja utthāyasanebhya ekāṃsena cīvarāṇi prāvṛtya dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ
S04bsu035_u:596_2: sarvalokapālastutaḥ stavito varṇitaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ sarvadevabhavanāvabhāsitaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
S04bsu035_u:597: imamasya bhadanta bhagavan suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasya vistareṇa parṣadi saṃprakāśyamānasyāsmākaṃ catūrṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇām /
S04bsu035_u:598: etena ca dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena ca divyātmabhāvamahātejasā vivardhayiṣyanti //
S04bsu035_u:599: asmākaṃ kāyeṣu vīryaṃ ca balaṃ sthāma ca saṃjanitaṃ bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:600: tejaśca śriyaṃ ca lakṣmīṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣvāviśanti /
S04bsu035_u:601: vayaṃ bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājā dhārmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmarājā dharmeṇa vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍanaramahoragāṇāṃ rājatvaṃ kārayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:603_1: satatasamitaṃ sarve jambudvīpaṃ divyena viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa vyavalokayiṣyāma
S04bsu035_u:604: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavannasmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ lokapāla iti saṃjñotpāditā //
S04bsu035_u:606: ye kecidbhadanta bhagavannasmin jambudvīpe viparyāsāḥ paracakreṇa copahatā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu035_u:608: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājā idamasya suvarṇaprabhāsoottamasūtrendrarājasya teṣāṃ ca sūtredradhāriṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃcodanāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:609_0: yadā ceme bhadanta bhagavan dharmabhāṇakā bhikṣavo 'smākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ saṃcodanayā
S04bsu035_u:609_1: buddhādhiṣṭhānena ca yeṣu viṣayeṣūpasaṃkrameyusteṣu te viṣayeṣuḥ cemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaṃ
S04bsu035_u:611: yasya ca bhadanta bhagavan manuṣyarājasya viṣaye te sūtrendradhārakā bhikṣavā dharmabhāṇākā upasaṃkrāntā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:612: ayaṃ ca manuṣyarāja imaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsasūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇyāt /
S04bsu035_u:613: śrutvā ca teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sarvapratyarthikebhya ārakṣāṃ kuryāt paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ kuryāt /
S04bsu035_u:614: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstasya manuṣyarājasya sarvaviṣayagatānāṃ ca sattvānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:615: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavan sarvamanuṣyarājaḥ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sukhatāṃ kuryāt /

S04bsu035_u:2097: anyeṣāṃ parahitābhiyuktānāṃ satpuruṣāṇa na duṣkaraḥ // Suv_19.4 //
S04bsu035_u:2099: kṛpākaruṇamamavatāriya sattvo divi ceha labhyate saḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2100: svadeha śataśa iha kṛtva muditamanāḥ parajīvaśarīre // Suv_19.5 //
S04bsu035_u:2101: atha te rājakumārāḥ paramasaṃdīptā eṣā vyāghrīti drutamanimiṣimanunirīkṣantaḥ pracaṅkramustato mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt /
S04bsu035_u:2105: śtanayakṛtadharmābhaidanāntairanantaṃ na vijahati anupūrvaṃ svasvabhāvaṃ kṛtaghnuḥ // Suv_19.6 //
S04bsu035_u:2107: nāstī tasyopajīvyaṃ sarvatu madhye bhutatvāttaṃ niyojya /
S04bsu035_u:2111: niḥsāraphenakalpaṃ kṛmiśatabharitaṃ kāryakṛtyaṃ tanu hi // Suv_19.8 //
S04bsu035_u:2113: saṃpūrṇaṃ dharmakāya guṇaśatabharitaṃ prāpsyeva suśuddham // Suv_19.9 //
S04bsu035_u:2114: sa khalvevaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ paramakaruṇoparigatahṛdayaḥ tayorvikṣepaṃ cakāra /
S04bsu035_u:2116: atha sa mahāsattvo rājakumāraḥ tasmādupavanātpratinivṛtya vyāghryā ālayamupagamya vanalatāyāṃ prāvaraṇamṛtsṛjya praṇidhānaṃ cakāra /
S04bsu035_u:2117: eṣo 'haṃ jagato hitārthamanuttarāṃ bodhiṃ vibudhya śivāṃ kāruṇyātpradadāmi niścalamatirdehaṃ parairdustyajam /
S04bsu035_u:2118: tanme bodhiranāmayā yā jinasutairabhyarcitā nirjvalā trailikyaṃ bhavasāgarātpratibhayāduttārayeyānmām /
S04bsu035_u:2120: tato vyāghrī maitrīvato bodhisattvasya na kiñciccakre /
S04bsu035_u:2121: tato bodhisattvo durbalāvarto 'yamathetyutthāya śastraṃ paryeṣate sma /
S04bsu035_u:2125: prapatitamātre ca bodhisattve bhūmiriyaṃ pracaravihīneva nauḥ salilamadhye gatā ṣaḍvikāraṃ pracacāla /
S04bsu035_u:2128: athānyatarā vismayā varjitamanasā devatā bodhisattvaṃ tuṣṭāva //
S04bsu035_u:2129: yathā kāruṇyaṃ te visṛtamiha sattveṣu sumate
S04bsu035_u:2130: yathā vai taddehaṃ tyajasi naravīra pramuditaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2132: nirāyāsaṃ śāntaṃ tvamiha na cirātprāpsyasi śubham // Suv_19.10 //
S04bsu035_u:2133: atha khalu sā vyāghrī rudhiramrakṣitaśarīraṃ bodhisattvamavekṣya muhūrtamātreṇa nirmāṃsarudhiramasthyavaśeṣaṃ cakāra //
S04bsu035_u:2135: pracalita sasamudrā sāgarā vasumatidaśadikṣū suptaraśmiśca sūryaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2136: patati kusumavarṣaṃ vyākulaṃ vā mano me svatanuriha visṛṣṭaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhrātṛṇā me // Suv_19.11//
S04bsu035_u:2138: yathā ca so karuṇavaco hyavocata samīkṣya tāṃ svatanāyabhakṣaṇodyatāṃ /
S04bsu035_u:2139: kṣudhānvitāṃ vyaśanaśataiḥ samanvitāṃ sudurbalā matiriha saṃśayā tu me // Suv_19.12 //
S04bsu035_u:2140: atha tau rājakumārau paramaśokābhibhūtau vāṣpapariplutākṣau tamenaṃ panthānaṃ pratinivṛtya gacchantau vyāghrīsamīpamevābhijagmatuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2141: taṃ dadṛśtuḥ śataṃ vaṃśalatāsamāyuktaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇavikṛṣṇāni (Bagchi 111)
S04bsu035_u:2143: nānādigvidikṣu keśānvistīrṇāndṛṣṭvā ca samūrcchannau bhūmau nipetatuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2145: aho priyabhrātṛka pārthivāyaṃ tathā jananī sutavatsalā yā
S04bsu035_u:2146: pṛcchiṣyate sā jananī tṛtīyaḥ kva vā yuvābhyāṃ kamalāyatekṣṇaḥ // Suv_19.13 //
S04bsu035_u:2147: aho hi asmākamihaiva śobhitaṃ nanū pradeśe maraṇaṃ na jīvitam /
S04bsu035_u:2148: kathaṃ mahāsattvavivarjitā vayaṃ dāsyāmahe darśanamambatātayoḥ // Suv_19.14 //
S04bsu035_u:2149: atha tau rājakumārau bahuvividhakaruṇaṃ vilāpya pracakramatuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2150: tatra kumārasyopasthāyakā diśi vidiśi pradhāvantaḥ kumārānveṣaṇāḥ parasparaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca papracchuḥ kva kumāraḥ kva kumāra iti /
S04bsu035_u:2151: tasmiṃśca samaye devī śayanatalagatā priyaviprayogasūcakaṃ svapnaṃ dadarśa /
S04bsu035_u:2152: tadyathā stanau chidyamānau dantotpātanaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ trayaḥ kapotaśāvakāḥ pratilambhamānāste bhītā eva śyenenācchidyamānāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2153: atha devī bhūmikāmpādutrastahṛdayā sahasā prativibudhya cintāparā babhūva //
S04bsu035_u:2154: kimeṣā bhūtadhātrī jalanidhivasanā kampati bhṛśaṃ sūryaḥ śūlī na raśmirmama ca kica bhūbhajaṃ vayati vā /
S04bsu035_u:2155: duḥkhaṃ kurvati me gātraṃ calati ca nayanaṃ svastanaṃ chidyatī ca /
S04bsu035_u:2156: svasti me syātsutānāṃ vanavivaramidaṃ krīḍanārthaṃ gatānām // Suv_19.15 //
S04bsu035_u:2157: athaivaṃ cintayantyāśceṭī ca saṃtrastahṛdayā praviśya devyā nivedayāmāsa /
S04bsu035_u:2166: tatra pravṛtte kumārānveṣaṇābhidrute janakāya athācirādeva rājā dadarśa dūrata evāgacchantau rājakumārau /
S04bsu035_u:2170: na bhavati nirupalambhe na prītirevaṃ narāṇāṃ bhavati sutaviyogādyādṛśaṃ daurmanasyam /
S04bsu035_u:2171: nanu varasukhinaste yena puṃsābhiyogā maraṇamupagatā vā ye na jīvanti putrāḥ // Suv_19.16 //
S04bsu035_u:2172: atha devī paramaśokābhibhūtā marmahanteva kalabhī ārtasvaramuvāca //
S04bsu035_u:2173: yadi tanayāstrayasya bhṛtyavargā vanavare kusumākule praviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2174: kva sa hṛdayasamo samastṛtīyaḥ sutamanayāpadavaiti kanīyasametat // Suv_19.17 //
S04bsu035_u:2175: tayorāgatayo rājā putrāvetatparyapṛcchatotsukaḥ kumārau paripṛcchati sma /
S04bsu035_u:2177: tataḥ śokārtāvaśrudrutanayanau pariśuṣkatālvoṣṭhadaśanavadanau na kiñcidūcatuḥ // devyuvāca //
S04bsu035_u:2178: kathayatāṃ laghu vimuhyati smṛtiśca paramabhṛśaṃ paripīḍyate ca dehaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2179: kva sa mama putrastṛtīya hṛdayaṃ idaṃ sphuṭitaṃ tu saṃmūrcchati vā // Suv_19.18 //
S04bsu035_u:2180: atha tau kumārau vistareṇa taṃ vṛttāntaṃ nivedayāmāsa /
S04bsu035_u:2183: atha rājā devī ca taṇyasthīnyapagatarudhiramāṃsāni vāyunā diśo vidiśaśca keśavikīrṇā dṛṣṭvā (Bagchi 113)
S04bsu035_u:2185: tataḥ purohitaḥ suciraṃ tāmavasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā salilamalayacandanapaṅkai rājño devyāśca śarīraṃ prahlādayāmāsa /
S04bsu035_u:2187: hā kaṣṭaṃ putra kva manorasa darśanīya mṛtyorvaśaṃ śīghramupagatāsi /
S04bsu035_u:2188: mṛtyoḥ praśmameva hi cāgato vinā te paraṃ mama bhaviṣyati duḥkhamanyat // Suv_19.19 //
S04bsu035_u:2189: devī ca mohātyāgatā prakīrṇakeśī bāhubhyāmurastāḍayantī sthānyāṃ pluta iva matsyā dharaṇyāstale parivartamānā mahiṣīva naṣṭavatsā kalabhīva naṣṭaśāvakā karuṇakaruṇaṃ roditi //
S04bsu035_u:2190: hā kānta priyasuta kena vrajase bhagno 'yaṃ padmo dharaṇītale hi vikīrṇaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2191: śatruṇā mama bhuvi kena nāśaṃ gato 'dya putro me nayanamanoharacandraḥ
S04bsu035_u:2192: hā kiṃ śarīramiha adya na yāti bhagnaṃ paśyāmi haṃ sutavaraṃ nihataṃ pṛthivyām // Suv_19.20 //
S04bsu035_u:2193: saṃvyaktaṃ hṛdayamayo mamaitaṃ dhigvyasanaṃ avekṣya no cedbhedayate /
S04bsu035_u:2195: svapnāntare dvau stanau daṃṣṭrotpāṭya me priyasuto nāśaṃ gataḥ śīghramataḥ // Suv_19.21 //
S04bsu035_u:2196: sa śyenenāpahṛto yathaiva iha me labdhaiḥ kapotaistribhiḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2197: so me 'dya tribhirātmajaiḥ parivṛta eko hato mṛtyunā // Suv_19.22 //
S04bsu035_u:2199_0: atha rājā devī ca bahuvidhaṃ karuṇakaruṇaṃ paridevatastayoḥ sarvabharaṇānyavamucya
S04bsu035_u:2199_1: mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ putrasya śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā tasminpṛthivīpradeśe suvarṇamayacaityeṣu
S04bsu035_u:2200: syātte khalu punarānandānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsattvo nāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
S04bsu035_u:2203: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsattvo nāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
S04bsu035_u:2204: tadāpi mayānanda rājadveṣamohāparimuktena narakādibhyaśca duḥkhebhyaḥ kṛpayā jagadanugṛhītam /
S04bsu035_u:2206: evaṃ hyekaikasya sattvasyārthe kalpaṃ samudeyaṃ narakeṣu jātiṃ saṃsārādvimocayeyam /
S04bsu035_u:2209: bahūni kalpāni mayātmā tyaktaḥ paryeṣayetā imamagrabodhim /
S04bsu035_u:2210: yathāsi rājā yatha rājaputram tathaiva tyaktā maya ātmabhāvāḥ // Suv_19.23 //
S04bsu035_u:2211: anusmarami purimāsu jātiṣu mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
S04bsu035_u:2212: tasyāpi putrau mahātyāgavanto nāmnā mahāsattva varo babhūva // Suv_19.24 //
S04bsu035_u:2213: dvau tasya āsīdatha bhrātarau ca nāmnā mahādeva mahāpraṇādaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2214: vanakhaṇḍa gatvā va samānagotraistairdṛṣṭa vyāghrī kṣudhayābhibhūtā // Suv_19.25 //
S04bsu035_u:2215: tasyāgrasattvasya kṛpābhijātā yannūna haṃ ātma tyajeya māṃsam /
S04bsu035_u:2217: eṣā hi vyāghrī kṣudhatarṣapīḍitā khādīya etāni svakātmajāni // Suv_19.26 //
S04bsu035_u:2219: dṛṣṭvā ca vyāghrīṃ kṣudhārtāṃ vyāghrasutamokṣārtham // Suv_19.27 //
S04bsu035_u:2220: karuṇāmaye patite 'tra kampita saśaila dharaṇī vidruta pakṣisaṃgha vividhāni /
S04bsu035_u:2222: dvau tasya bhrātarau ca mahāpraṇādastathā mahādevaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2223: na labhete mahāsattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mahāvanakhaṇḍe 'smin // Suv_19.29 //
S04bsu035_u:2227: tatropasaṃkramitva yatra vyāghrī sudurbalā śayitā vyāghrīsutā // Suv_19.31 //
S04bsu035_u:2229: avakīrṇa patitāni yatkiñcinmātraṃ tasya patitaṃ dharaṇīyaṃ paśyanti // Suv_19.32 //
S04bsu035_u:2231: ubhau tau nṛpasutau saṃmūrcchitau hi tatra patanti dharaṇīyam /
S04bsu035_u:2242: śṛṇu mama nṛpate narendra śokāgninā mama dahyate śarīram /
S04bsu035_u:2244: sūcībhirivāṅgamaṅgaṃ pīḍyanti sma tāni mama hṛdayaṃ ca /
S04bsu035_u:2246: yathā nimittaṃ yādṛśa na bhūya paśyāmi darśanaṃ priyasutāna // Suv_19.39 //
S04bsu035_u:2247: putrāṇāṃ me vijāna dadāhi mama jīvitaṃ kṣemaṃ kuruṣva /
S04bsu035_u:2248: svapno mayā dṛṣṭastrayo mama kapotasutāni yo 'sya tṛtīyamahaṃ kapotasutaṃ priyamanā // Suv_19.40 //
S04bsu035_u:2249: śyenastatra praviṣṭaḥ śyenenāpahṛtaṃ kapotakaṃ ca svapnāntare ca /
S04bsu035_u:2250: mama īdṛśa śokaṃ praviṣṭiṃ hṛdaye 'smin // Suv_19.41 //
S04bsu035_u:2251: atidāhaśokacintā maraṇaṃ mama bhaviṣyati na cireṇa /
S04bsu035_u:2252: putrāṇa me vijāna dadasva mama jīvitaṃ bhavānsvakāruṇyam // Suv_19.42 //
S04bsu035_u:2256: dṛṣṭvā tāmagramahiṣīṃ saṃmūrcchitapatitāṃ ca tatra dharaṇīye /
S04bsu035_u:2258: amātyāśca prayuktā jijñāsārthaṃ gatāḥ kumārāṇām // Suv_19.44 //
S04bsu035_u:2261: tathā āgatāścāśrumukhā rodamānāḥ pṛcchinti patheṣu taṃ mahāsattvam // Suv_19.45 //
S04bsu035_u:2262: kiṃ jīvito vāṃ kva gataḥ sāṃprataṃ mahāsattvaḥ kiṃ drakṣyāmyahamadya /
S04bsu035_u:2263: manāpaṃ sattvadarśana priyamanāpaṃ na cireṇa vinaṣṭaśramam // Suv_19.46 //
S04bsu035_u:2265: anantāyāsasaṃkaṭāni ghoṣaḥ rājā mahārathotthāya rodamānaḥ // Suv_19.47 //
S04bsu035_u:2266: śokārttaḥ siñcati saliladhāraiḥ agramahiṣīṃ ca dharaṇīye patantīṃ /
S04bsu035_u:2267: siñcati udakena yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate utthāya pṛcchiraṃ dīnamānasā // Suv_19.48 //
S04bsu035_u:2268: kiṃ mama putrā hi mṛtā jīvanti rājā mahārathaścāgramahiṣīṃ ca /
S04bsu035_u:2269: evamevāvoca diśi vidiśāsu amātyā pārṣadyā jijñāsārthaṃ gatāḥ // Suv_19.49 //
S04bsu035_u:2270: kumārāṇāṃ mā tvamatidīnamānasā bhavā hīnāyāsa śokahṛdayā /
S04bsu035_u:2271: evaṃ mahārathaśca kṣamāpayitvā tadāgramahiṣīṃ ca kampo niṣkrame // Suv_19.50 //
S04bsu035_u:2273: sudīnamanasātha dīnacakṣuśca niṣkramya nagarapurato jijñāsārthāya // Suv_19.51 //
S04bsu035_u:2275: rājā putrāṇāṃ bahuprāṇinaḥ aśrumukho rodamāno dhāvati /
S04bsu035_u:2276: nirgataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubuddho 'tha samanantaraniṣkrāntaḥ // Suv_19.52 //
S04bsu035_u:2278: diśatāṃ sugaulanayano dṛṣṭvānyataraṃ puruṣaṃ muṇḍitaśīrṣaṃ ca // Suv_19.53 //
S04bsu035_u:2282: śīghrabhārādupasaṃkramya nṛpate rājño mahārathasya āvaciṃsu // Suv_19.55 //
S04bsu035_u:2283: mā śokacittastvaṃ bhava nṛpate tiṣṭhanti te putrāḥ priyamanāpāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2284: na cireṇāgamya iha tavāntike drakṣyasi tvaṃ putravaraṃ manāpam // Suv_19.56 //
S04bsu035_u:2287: dvai ca te putrai mahānṛpendra tiṣṭhataḥ śokānalasaṃpradīptau /
S04bsu035_u:2288: ekastavo putravaro na dṛśyeta nṛpa grasto mahāsattva anityatayā // Suv_19.58 //
S04bsu035_u:2291: teṣāṃ mahāsattva varakumāro mahānta kāruṇya balaṃ janetvā // Suv_19.59 //
S04bsu035_u:2292: bodhau ca kṛtvā praṇidhimudārāṃ sarvāṃśca sattvāniha bodhayiṣye /
S04bsu035_u:2293: taṃ bodhiṃ gambhīramudāramiṣṭvā anāgate 'dhvani ahaṃ spṛśeyam // Suv_19.60 //
S04bsu035_u:2294: patito mahāsattvo giri taṭatu so 'gre sthito vyāghryaḥ kṣudhābhibhūtāyāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2295: muhūrta nirmāsakṛtaḥ sa aṅgaṃ ca asthāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtaḥ rājaputraḥ // Suv_19.61 //
S04bsu035_u:2296: evaṃ ca śrutvā sa vacaḥ sudhāreṃ saṃmūrcchito rāja mahārathaśca /
S04bsu035_u:2297: patitaśca dharaṇīya vinaṣṭacittaḥ śokāgninā prajvalitaḥ sudāruṇā // Suv_19.62 //
S04bsu035_u:2299: sarve sthitā ūrdhvabāhuśca sa kandamānāḥ tṛtīyo 'mātyo nṛpamabravīt // Suv_19.63 //
S04bsu035_u:2300: dṛṣṭau mayādya ubhau kumārau samucchatau tatra mahāvane 'smin /
S04bsu035_u:2301: patitau dharaṇyāṃ ca vinaṣṭacittau asmābhirudakena ca siñcitāni // Suv_19.64 //
S04bsu035_u:2302: yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate punaḥ sthitau hi ādīpta paśyanti diśaścatastraḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2303: muhūrta tiṣṭhanti patanti bhūmau kāruṇasvareṇa paridevayanti // Suv_19.65 //
S04bsu035_u:2306: sa caiva rājā hṛdi dīnacittaḥ putraviyogātsuvikṣiptacittaḥ // Suv_19.66 //
S04bsu035_u:2307: śokapraviddhaḥ paridevayitvā evaṃ hi rājā paridevayanti /
S04bsu035_u:2308: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena // Suv_19.67 //
S04bsu035_u:2309: mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /
S04bsu035_u:2310: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau // Suv_19.68 //
S04bsu035_u:2311: śīghreṇa yānena ca rājadhānīṃ praveśayedrājakulānta śīghram /
S04bsu035_u:2312: mā eṣā māturhi janetu kāmaṃ śokāgninā taddhṛdaya sphaṭe tat // Suv_19.69 //
S04bsu035_u:2313: putrau ca dṛṣṭvā labhate praśāntiṃ na jīvitenālabhate viyogam /
S04bsu035_u:2314: rājāpi cāmātyagaṇena sārdhaṃ dvipābhirūḍho gata tatra darśitu // Suv_19.70 //
S04bsu035_u:2315: dṛṣṭvā ca putrau bhrātṛnāmāhvānau karuṇāsvaraṃ krandatau āttamānā /
S04bsu035_u:2316: rājā hi tatputradvayaṃ gṛhītvā prarodamānopi puraṃ vrajitvā /
S04bsu035_u:2317: sā śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāna svaputrāṃ devīṃ adarśetsutaputrakāmām // Suv_19.71 //
S04bsu035_u:2319: ahaṃ ca sa śākyamunistathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsattvavaro babhūva //
S04bsu035_u:2320: putraśca rājño hi mahārathasya yenaiva vyāghrī sukhitā kṛtāsīt // Suv_19.72 //
